attributes.action: Begin vaccinating overseas British citizens through our Embassies & Consulates.
attributes.additional_details: It’s estimated 5.5 million Britain’s live overseas, many of whom are unable to obtain a vaccine. Many will not be able to travel home for the vaccine due to the crippling costs of quarantine when arriving into the UK. We are calling on the government to send vaccines to it’s embassies around the world to help British Citizens globally.
attributes.background: With the successful & rapid rollout of the vaccine for citizens here in the UK, it’s time to extend the program to include Britons living abroad! Many of whom are finding it difficult to obtain vaccines in their host countries. This can be achieved through our vast network of diplomatic missions.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/586772
